titles.title: Tobacco Tax Parity Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to impose the same rate of tax on pipe tobacco as is imposed on roll-your-own tobacco.
Tobacco Tax Parity Act of 2010

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Tobacco Tax Parity Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make the excise tax on pipe tobacco equal to the tax on roll-your-own tobacco (i.e., $24.78 per pound).
